owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Chris Bizer <chris@bizer.de>
Emmanuel Pietriga <emmanuel.pietriga@inria.fr>
Ryan Lee <ryanlee@w3.org>
Stefano Mazzocchi <stefanom@mit.edu>
owl:Ontology.dc:description: OWL Full vocabulary for defining lenses and formats on RDF models.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Fresnel Lens and Format Core Vocabulary

owl:Class.comment: This is a convenience class for the OWL specification of Fresnel (an rdf:List of resource selectors only).
Abstract class for expressing shorthands a browser must understand how to expand.
owl:Class.label: Convenience Token

owl:Class.comment: A Fresnel format class for displaying RDF data; the domain property can be only one of :formatDomain, :classFormatDomain, :instanceFormatDomain.
owl:Class.label: Format Class

owl:Class.comment: Description of fresnel:Format content separators; super class, not to be used directly.
owl:Class.label: Format Description

owl:Class.comment: Description of fresnel:Format content separators only; contentNoValue will not be recognized in conjunction with this class.
owl:Class.label: Format Description No Substitution

owl:Class.comment: Description of fresnel:Format content separators and content replacement if values are missing.
owl:Class.label: Format Description Substitution

owl:Class.comment: A Fresnel Group is used for grouping formats and lenses together.
owl:Class.label: Group

owl:Class.comment: This is a convenience class for the OWL specification of Fresnel.
owl:Class.label: Hide Property List

owl:Class.comment: Abstract superclass of all labelling formats.
owl:Class.label: Labelling Format

owl:Class.comment: More detailed description of the property, e.g. for specifing sublenses or merging properties.
owl:Class.label: Property Description

owl:Class.comment: Abstract superclass of all property value display styles.
owl:Class.label: Property value display style

owl:Class.comment: Propose in which a specific lens might be appropriate.
owl:Class.label: Purpose

owl:Class.comment: This is a convenience class for the OWL specification of Fresnel.
owl:Class.label: Show Property List

f:PropertySet.comment: Set of all properties of the current instance, which have not be explicitly named before.
f:PropertySet.label: All Properties

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: The Format should be applied to instances of this class.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: class format domain

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies that the lens is usable for the specified class and its subclasses.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: class lens domain

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Content that should be displayed before the content of the current box.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: content after

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Content that should be displayed before the content of the current box.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: content before

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Content that should be displayed before the content of the first element in a list of boxes; takes over the first :contentBefore element in case of a conflict.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: content first

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Content that should be displayed after the content of the last element in a list of boxes; takes over the last :contentAfter element in case of a conflict.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: content last

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Content that should be displayed if the current property is missing.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: content no value

f:Purpose.comment: Provides the browser with a starting point which lens to show.
f:Purpose.label: Default Lens

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Closure mechanism, if lenses are recursively used; the recursive depth limit.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: depth

f:PropertyValueStyle.comment: Show the property value as a dereferenceable URL.
f:PropertyValueStyle.label: External Link

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies the format group to which a format or a lens belongs.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: group

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: List of all properties which should be hidden. Must be used together with 'fresnel:showProperties fresnel:allProperties.'
owl:ObjectProperty.label: hide properties

f:PropertyValueStyle.comment: Show the property value as an image, such as PNG or JPEG .
f:PropertyValueStyle.label: Image

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: The Format should be applied to this set of instances.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: instance format domain

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: The lens is usable for the specified set of instances.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: instance lens domain

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies how a property is labelled (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: label

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Assign content formatting to a set of labels (theoretically, this does not make much sense, but it does round out the set of formatting properties; only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: label format

f:Purpose.comment: Lens for providing a label for a resource.
f:Purpose.label: Label Lens

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Attaching a symbol appropriate for styling labels (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: label style

f:ConvienceProperty.comment: A special token to indicate the relationship between any RDF container or collection (rdf:List) and its member items. Do not use as anything other than an individual.
f:ConvienceProperty.label: member

f:LabellingFormat.comment: Do not show any label for the property.
f:LabellingFormat.label: none

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies the classes that should be considered primaries, or first class results; secondary resources not matching the primaries will only be shown as sublenses. The range is a list of resource selectors.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: primaryClasses

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: The RDF property, which is described.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: property

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Assign content formatting to a set of properties (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: property format

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: The Format should be used for the specified properties.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: property format domain

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Attaching a symbol appropriate for styling properties (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: property style

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies a purpose for which a lens or format might be appropriate.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: purpose

f:PropertyValueStyle.comment: Any kind of retrievable resource like an image, audio or video that should be displayed as property value. The browser should try retrieve the resource and show it instead of the property value URI. The browser has to negotiate an appropriate media type with the server using HTTP content negotiation.
f:PropertyValueStyle.label: Replaced Resource

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Assign content formatting to a set of resources (only works in conjunction with classFormatDomain and instanceFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: resource format

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Attaching a symbol appropriate for styling a resource. resourceStyle is ignored if not used with :classFormatDomain or :instanceFormatDomain.
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: resource style

f:LabellingFormat.comment: Show the RDFS Label of the property. This is the default and doesn't have to be declared.
f:LabellingFormat.label: Show Label

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: List of all properties which should be shown.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: show properties

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Sublens which should be used for displaying property values.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: sublens

f:PropertyValueStyle.comment: Show the property value as an URI.
f:PropertyValueStyle.label: URI

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Explicit definition of fresnel:Group containing formats that should be used to render the lens or sublens.
owl:ObjectProperty.label: use

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Specifies how a property value is displayed (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: property value

owl:ObjectProperty.comment: Assign content formatting to a set of values (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:ObjectProperty.label: value format

owl:DatatypeProperty.comment: Attaching a symbol appropriate for styling the values of a property (only works in conjunction with propertyFormatDomain).
owl:DatatypeProperty.label: value style
